Articles.Content:
I recently finded one city named Kerman in game called Rise of Nations,that city has been of course persian.

Question is:Are Kermans named after city in persia?

First of all, they're called Kerbals.

Second of all, Kerbals are named after brave tinfoil men a young HarvesteR strapped to fireworks.
Whered you get that info from? Like to see his post

First of all, they're called Kerbals.

Second of all, Kerbals are named after brave tinfoil men a young HarvesteR strapped to fireworks.

But what about Bill Kerman,Bob Kerman and of course Jebediah Kerman?

But what about Bill Kerman,Bob Kerman and of course Jebediah Kerman?

Kerman is the last name. They're 'race' is called Kerbals.

Second of all, Kerbals are named after brave tinfoil men a young HarvesteR strapped to fireworks.

HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA. That is so awesome.

Kerman is the last name. They're 'race' is called Kerbals.

I talked about they're familly.

First of all, they're called Kerbals.

Second of all, Kerbals are named after brave tinfoil men a young HarvesteR strapped to fireworks.

I thought 'kerbals' were what they ended up calling their failed home built rocketry attempts, (which usually exploded)

Kerman is the last name. They're 'race' is called Kerbals.

And, one can speculate they are all of the same family. I like to think they asexually reproduce, it explains why they can come back to fly another rickety rocket after certain death.
